title: Пробный переезд
overview: Anfisa Chernykh and Anton Zaitsev set out on a journey across the country to find out where in Rus' to live well and happily. The hosts will explore the country and tell you amazing things about cities worth moving to. Where and for how much to rent a house? Where to get a job? Which restaurant to choose? No hackneyed advice from guidebooks, only answers to the most vital questions.
